ibis.rmi.server
Class UnicastRemoteObject

java.lang.Object
  ibis.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      ibis.rmi.server.RemoteServer
          ibis.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
Remote, Serializable
public class UnicastRemoteObject
extends RemoteServer

The UnicastRemoteObject class defines a remote object that is only valid while its server process is alive. A remote object should extend RemoteObject, usually by extending UnicastRemoteObject.

See Also:
Serialized Form

          Returns a clone of the remote object.
